keypoints: Whenever I'm not striking the computer keyboard, I try to create fruitful memories with my family and friends. I like to entertain people.
I'm interested in building products that will be used by the mass, on their routine.
I like learning something new everyday. A day is unfulfilled, failing that.
I like my beer served chill.
I like sports (more playing than watching them on TV).
I'm health conscious, and I meditate daily to keep myself calm and composed.
